description.narrative: Mainstream the SDGs into the social and economic development policies and planning of the Neixiang County
seat of a third-order administrative division

activity-description.narrative: The location where activities will be carried out.

sector.narrative: Eradicate poverty in all its forms and dimensions

description.narrative: 1.1) Apply SDG Framework to evaluate the Neixiang County's 13th Five-Year Plan and develop policy recommendation to incorporate the SDGs into Neixiang Country's 14th Five-Year Plan. 1.2) Conduct a survey of the social, economic and environmental baselines of Neixiang County, as well as the development and future development trends of the secondary industry. 1.3) Develop monitoring methods for Neixiang and conduct annual monitoring for this project. 1.4) Provide number of capacity building training sessions for government officials in Neixiang County, including trainings on SDGs, development planning, public services, social governance and inclusive finance. 2.1) Carry out number of baseline survey of social, economic and environment development in the Neixiang County combined with the SDGs Framework, investigate and understand the policy status and data quality of the local key industries combination with the SDGs Framework, investigate and understand the policy status and data quality of the local key industries. 2.2) Prepare number of development guidelines based on the SDGs Framework and the assessment of the implementation of Neixiang County’s 13th Five-Year Plan; organize meetings and seminars of relevant industries and compile a social, economic and environmental development planning roadmap for Neixiang County. 2.3) Prepare number of report on inclusive development and inclusive finance development in Neixiang County and formulate incentive policies and measures. 2.4) Select number of key industries as sustainable development planning pilot according to the social, economic and environmental development planning roadmap. 3.1) Carry out number of needs assessment for capacity building activities and adopt a systematic approach to assess the status and development needs of relevant departments when implementing the SDGs, especially for those department with planning functions in the Neixiang Principle Government. 3.2) Conduct number of case studies of best pra

comment.narrative: 1.1) Apply 0 SDG Framework to evaluate the Neixiang County's 13th Five-Year Plan and develop policy recommendation to incorporate the SDGs into Neixiang Country's 14th Five-Year Plan. 1.2) Conduct 0 survey of the social, economic and environmental baselines of Neixiang County, as well as the development and future development trends of the secondary industry. 1.3) Develop 0 monitoring method for Neixiang and conduct annual monitoring for this project. 1.4) Provide 0 capacity building training sessions for government officials in Neixiang County, including trainings on SDGs, development planning, public services, social governance and inclusive finance. 2.1) Carry out 0 baseline survey of social, economic and environment development in the Neixiang County combined with the SDGs Framework, investigate and understand the policy status and data quality of the local key industries combination with the SDGs Framework, investigate and understand the policy status and data quality of the local key industries. 2.2) Prepare 0 development guideline based on the SDGs Framework and the assessment of the implementation of Neixiang County’s 13th Five-Year Plan; organize meetings and seminars of relevant industries and compile a social, economic and environmental development planning roadmap for Neixiang County. 2.3) Prepare 0 report on inclusive development and inclusive finance development in Neixiang County and formulate incentive policies and measures. 2.4) Select 0 key industry as sustainable development planning pilot according to the social, economic and environmental development planning roadmap. 3.1) Carry out 0 need assessment for capacity building activities and adopt a systematic approach to assess the status and development needs of relevant departments when implementing the SDGs, especially for those department with planning functions in the Neixiang Principle Government. 3.2) Conduct 0 case study of best practices for sustainable development in the domestic counties
Year 2018 is the baseline year. The target remains the same as baseline.
Year 2018 is the baseline year. The result remains the same as baseline.

1.1) Apply 1 SDG Framework to evaluate the Neixiang County's 13th Five-Year Plan and develop policy recommendation to incorporate the SDGs into Neixiang Country's 14th Five-Year Plan. 1.2) Conduct 1 survey of the social, economic and environmental baselines of Neixiang County, as well as the development and future development trends of the secondary industry. 1.3) Develop 1 monitoring method for Neixiang and conduct annual monitoring for this project. 1.4) Provide 47 capacity building training sessions for government officials in Neixiang County, including trainings on SDGs, development planning, public services, social governance and inclusive finance. 2.1) Carry out 1 baseline survey of social, economic and environment development in the Neixiang County combined with the SDGs Framework, investigate and understand the policy status and data quality of the local key industries combination with the SDGs Framework, investigate and understand the policy status and data quality of the local key industries. 2.2) Prepare 1 development guideline based on the SDGs Framework and the assessment of the implementation of Neixiang County’s 13th Five-Year Plan; organize meetings and seminars of relevant industries and compile a social, economic and environmental development planning roadmap for Neixiang County. 2.3) Prepare 1 report on inclusive development and inclusive finance development in Neixiang County and formulate incentive policies and measures. 2.4) Select 2 key industry as sustainable development planning pilot according to the social, economic and environmental development planning roadmap. 3.1) Carry out 1 need assessment for capacity building activities and adopt a systematic approach to assess the status and development needs of relevant departments when implementing the SDGs, especially for those department with planning functions in the Neixiang Principle Government. 3.2) Conduct 1 case study of best practices for sustainable development in the domestic counties. 3.3) Conduct 1 case study of best practices for sustainable development in foreign counties or similar districts. 3.4) Develop 5 methodologies for monitoring sustainable development target indicators and monitor the implementation of SDGs in Neixiang County. 4.1) 1 baseline surveys, conduct baseline surveys in demonstration areas, including farmer upgrade surveys; community service status surveys; community service needs surveys. 4.2) Increase 1 collective assets and increase income of collective asset by supporting the preparation and implementation of village collective economic development demonstration plan, through the rational use of demonstration village resources, in particular, the rational use of homesteads. 4.3) Improve 1 community service functions, achieve a dynamic integration of rural pension, rural minimum living standard security system and dynamic integration services to demonstrate ageing services at the village level. 4.4) Support the preparation and implementation of 1 village collective economic development demonstration plan, by effectively using the villages’ resource in demonstration area, especially have a better use of the homesteads, increase collective assets, and increase collective asset income. 5.1) Plan 1 demonstration primary schools based on local geographical conditions and population distribution. 5.2) Provide 7 public services such as school bus services to facilitate rural left-behind children to enter school. 5.3) Improve the quality of 35 rural school teachers and enhance the attractiveness of rural teachers. Provide comprehensive training in distance education and teacher rotation to substantially improve the quality of education. 5.4) Provide 3 comprehensive training in distance education and teacher rotation to substantially improve the level of education. 6.1) Establish 1 Women's Development Fund to provide women with small loans to support their entrepreneurial activities. 6.2) Establish 3 women’s centers and women’s groups in model villages to promote women empowerment. 7.1) 4 village Environmental Planning to support the preparation and implementation of the “Rural Complex” demonstration plan for the Zhaqu Taishan Temple. 7.2) 4 industry Planning to support the preparation and implementation of the “Rural Complex” demonstration plan for the Zhaqu Taishan Temple. 7.3) 4 tourism Planning to support the preparation and implementation of the “Rural Complex” demonstration plan for the Zhaqu Taishan Temple. 7.4) 4 research on the organization and operation mode of the demonstration area, such as the organizational operation mode of “Company + Village + Family Farm" to support the preparation and implementation of the “Rural Complex” demonstration plan for the Zhaqu Taishan Temple. 7.5) 4 research on the mechanism of interest distribution: establish a complete set of interest distribution mechanisms, such as the cooperative dividend mechanism to support the preparation and implementation of the “Rural Complex” demonstration plan for the Zhaqu Taishan Temple. 7.6) 4 research on market management entities and business models to support the preparation and implementation of the “Rural Complex” demonstration plan for the Zhaqu Taishan Temple. 8.1) Support 1 preparation and implementation of the Deng Kiln Cultural Heritage Cultural Tourism Demonstration Plan. 8.2) 1 Wujia Stone Village Cultural Tourism Demonstration Plan. 9.1) Conduct 50 financial literacy activities and design financial education programs (both online and offline) for women, young entrepreneurs, and grassroots cadres. 9.2) Conduct 150 vocational skill training sessions, including tourism service training courses, prioritizing the needs of women and the youth. 9.3) Support 2 professional cooperative organizations, extending the relevant industrial chain of pilot villages (such as organic agriculture) and increasing employment opportunities for farmers. 10.1) Summarize 4 experience of the Neixiang Principle Government in facilitating public goods, poverty alleviation and sustainable livelihoods respectively and form cases. 10.2) Conduct 0 development policy impact assessment and complete the implementation of the SDGs: China's Experience - Neixiang Project, and form intellectual products. 10.3) Develop 2 videos and other case materials, disseminate project results through the international network of UNDP. 11.1) Support the development and implementation of 1 comprehensive publicity and education plan for the three-year SDGs of the Neixiang County. 11.2) Prepare 3 training and publicity materials for different audiences. 11.3) Support 1 demonstration sites such as the “Taishan Temple Rural Complex” and the role of community as publicity center; focusing on the education and awareness raising activities of the public SDGs and improve the publicity planning and activities. 11.4) Incorporate the core information of the SDGs Framework into 4 cultural and sports activities in the Neixiang County, such as enterprise employee training sessions, cultural activities, mass sports games, knowledge contests and technical competitions. 12.1) Create and regularly hold 1 the “County Economy Sustainable Development Experience Exchange and Sharing Mechanism Based on the UN SDGs Framework". 12.2) Share 2 experience of localization of the Neixiang County SDGs Framework at both national and international levels.
